content.text: Hi! I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
That's really great! I also have some great friends who are always there for me.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
That's so sweet! My partner and I are expecting our first child in April, so I'm excited to be a mom soon.
Congratulations! That's such exciting news! I'm sure you'll be a great mom.
Thanks! I'm trying to prepare as much as I can.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a natural.
What are you most looking forward to about being a mom?
There are so many things! I'm excited to watch them grow and learn, and to be a part of their lives.
That's going to be so much fun!
Well, congratulations again! I'm sure you're going to be a great mom.
